caption:
This photograph captures a scene at an airport featuring a Pan Am airplane positioned on the tarmac. The airplane, possibly a Boeing 747 given its size and design, is mostly in view with the nose slightly cut off. The aircraft has the distinctive Pan Am logo on its tail and the name "Pan Am" prominently displayed on its front, just below the cockpit windows.

Surrounding the airplane are various airport vehicles and equipment, providing a bustling look typical of a busy airport. There are people visible near the front of the plane, some of whom appear to be boarding or working around it, giving a sense of activity and movement. Additionally, there are luggage carts laden with items, and a service van parked on the tarmac close to the aircraft.

In the background, other airplanes and airport structures are visible, accentuating the depth and scale of the airport environment. The scene is set under bright daylight, highlighting vibrant blue skies and contributing to a clear, crisp image. Overall, the photograph offers a detailed snapshot of an active moment at an airport, centered around a notable Pan Am airplane.
title: At the John F. Kennedy Airport
